stakeholder_alignment.issue: Different interpretations of transition scope between customer architect team and delivery team.
stakeholder_alignment.impact: Misaligned expectations on KT depth and milestone readiness.
stakeholder_alignment.evidence: Customer architect refers to 'end-to-end functional walkthrough', but delivery team prepared only system-level KT notes.

stakeholder_alignment.issue: Unclear ownership for environment access approvals.
stakeholder_alignment.impact: Delays in hands-on KT and application walkthroughs.
stakeholder_alignment.evidence: Multiple emails sent to environment ops team with no confirmed approver.

communication_cadence.observation: Daily syncs happening inconsistently between offshore and customer SMEs.
communication_cadence.impact: Knowledge gaps not closed in time; backlog of unanswered queries.
communication_cadence.evidence: Offshore team reported 15 pending KT clarifications due to missing SME availability.

communication_cadence.observation: Escalation process not clearly defined for missing SME attendance.
communication_cadence.impact: Critical dependencies pushed forward by 4–5 days.
communication_cadence.evidence: Program manager escalated only after repeated follow-ups.

documentation_quality.issue: KT notes shared via email attachments instead of centralized Confluence space.
documentation_quality.impact: Version mismatch and outdated KT content increasing rework.
documentation_quality.evidence: Two versions of 'Batch Jobs Overview' documents identified.

documentation_quality.issue: No formal sign-off checkpoints for reviewed documents.
documentation_quality.impact: Delivery team unclear on what is approved vs draft.
documentation_quality.evidence: Customer lead verbally approved changes but no documentation updated.

collaboration_patterns.pattern: Onshore SMEs overloaded with BAU + transition KT.
collaboration_patterns.impact: Slower response times & rushed KT sessions.
collaboration_patterns.evidence: Average response SLA increased from 6 hours to 18 hours.

collaboration_patterns.pattern: Offshore team asking repeated clarifications due to lack of visual documentation.
collaboration_patterns.impact: High rework cycles on functional process understanding.
collaboration_patterns.evidence: Similar queries asked across teams due to missing sequence diagrams.

alerts.alert: Cross-functional dependencies (DB, Network, Middleware) not visible in KT tracker.
alerts.impact: Risk of major delays during environment provisioning & E2E testing.

alerts.alert: No shared channel bridging customer architects and offshore dev team.
alerts.impact: Information propagation delay → 1–2 day lag per clarification.
